title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 07 September 2015 - XWiki
content:
<abusenius\_> has quit  
01:59 <sdumitriu> has quit  
02:13 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
03:49 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
08:57 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
09:07 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:10 <Pbas> has joined #xwiki  
09:16 <Ramona1> has quit  
09:21 <Ramona1> has joined #xwiki  
09:36 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
09:45 <Pbas> has quit  
09:45 <vmassol1> good morning everyone  
09:45 <vmassol1> is now known as <vmassol>  
09:46 <Pbas> has joined #xwiki  
09:46 <vmassol> this week is important for us since it's the week before we release 7.2RC1 :)  
09:46 <vmassol> so we have one week to clear up the remaining jira issues for RC1  
09:46 <vmassol> 25 as of now  
09:46 <vmassol> I'll check if some can be moved for mater  
09:46 <vmassol> \*later  
09:48 <vmassol> Hi Denis, will you be able to tackle XWIKI-12165 this week?  
09:48 <vmassol> (ie for the 7.2 release)  
09:49 <vmassol> same question for XWIKI-12389  
09:49 <vmassol> I need to know if I have to move them to 7.3M1  
09:49 <Trefex> has joined #xwiki  
10:12 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
10:19 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
10:35 <Trefex> has quit  
10:41 <Trefex> has joined #xwiki  
10:53 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
10:55 <Ramona1> has quit  
10:55 <Ramona1> has joined #xwiki  
11:09 <Ramona1> has quit  
11:09 <Ramona3> has joined #xwiki  
11:14 <vmassol> note: ci maintenant going on ATM  
11:32 <Ramona1> has joined #xwiki  
11:34 <Ramona3> has quit  
12:08 <Ramona3> has joined #xwiki  
12:11 <Ramona1> has quit  
12:24 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
12:29 <Trefex> has quit  
12:32 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
12:35 <Ramona3> has quit  
12:35 <Ramona1> has joined #xwiki  
13:03 <Denis> has quit  
14:23 <Ramona1> has quit  
14:40 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
14:43 <Trefex> has joined #xwiki  
15:00 <msmeria> has quit  
15:01 <Trefex> has quit  
15:03 <Trefex> has joined #xwiki  
15:07 <vmassol> gsmeria: hi, could you please tell us what doesn't work when you tested the office app with nested spaces? see http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-12332  
15:07 <vmassol> (would be nice if you could add the details in the issue itself)  
15:07 <Trefex> has quit  
15:12 <gsmeria> Hello. I created that issue, because you can see from the UI that it uses "space" notion and I also found those methods in the pages of the application which I thought it will break its functionality. I will test it now and complete with some other details  
15:14 <vmassol> gsmeria: in general, the best is to test the app/module to see if something is broken or not  
15:14 <vmassol> ok thanks  
15:14 <vmassol> @all: any remark concerning http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-12459# I'd like to implement it  
15:32 <tmortagne> vmassol: XWIKI-12332 I explained at least one of the issue in a comment  
15:34 <vmassol> tmortagne: ah ok, I didn't understand your comment, which is actually why I asked gsmeria if it was tested…  
15:34 <vmassol> in any case we need to know if the app still works when importing on non-nested spaces  
15:35 <vmassol> if it does then we can move ti to post 7.2  
15:35 <tmortagne> there should not be any issue on non-nested spaces  
15:35 <vmassol> ok then there's no need for gsmeria to test , right? and we can move the issue to 7.3M1?  
15:35 <tmortagne> and since the UI does not really allow importing on nested space that should be ok  
15:36 <tmortagne> never harm to test since we don't have a single UI test for the whole office module  
15:36 <tmortagne> but I guess office import is already part of things tested in general by the test team  
15:38 <tmortagne> in any case XWIKI-12332 can me moved to later IMO  
15:38 <tmortagne> if any bug is found in the office module it should be another issue  
16:01 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
16:04 <woshilapin> has quit  
16:23 <Trefex> has joined #xwiki  
16:31 <gsmeria> vmassol: I've updated the description for http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-12332  
16:49 <vmassol> thanks gsmeria  
16:51 <vmassol> guys I'm going to implement http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-12459# (after discussing with evalica) please let me know quickly if you don't agree.  
17:04 <Trefex> has quit  
17:06 <vmassol> note that evalica is creating an issue: we're missing the space index view for 7.2 final!  
17:08 <vmassol> note that we still have tons of instance of the word "Space" in ApplicationResources.properties….  
17:12 <gsmeria> has left #xwiki  
17:15 <mflorea> vmassol: there is http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-12218  
17:16 <vmassol> thanks mflorea. evalica: that's for you :)  
17:23 <vmassol> 18 issues to go for RC1 :)  
17:34 <vmassol> mflorea/all: do we have a jira issue for adding the filterable Document Tree on the Home icon?  
17:34 <vmassol> (just checked the issues for RC1 and I couldn't find it)  
17:36 <mflorea> I don't know if there is an issue, but is this for RC1? I though it is for later  
17:36 <vmassol> It can be for later I think even though it would have been nice  
17:37 <vmassol> but not sure we'll have the time  
17:37 <vmassol> ok creating the issue  
17:38 <mflorea> wait  
17:38 <Enygma`> http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-12430  
17:38 <mflorea> vmassol  
17:39 <vmassol> ah ok thanks  
17:39 <vmassol> I reported it :)  
17:39 <vmassol> I need to buy myself some brain extender...  
17:48 <Chuguniy> has joined #xwiki  
18:11 <vmassol> mflorea: re the documentTree macro, what's the max # of nodes displayed by default? I couldn't find a property to specify how many to list before "more.." is displayed  
18:11 <vmassol> (by reading http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Document+Tree+Macro )  
18:11 <mflorea> you mean the max number of siblings, that's 15  
18:11 <vmassol> yes, ok, can it be controlled?  
18:12 <mflorea> currently it's not configurable, https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/blob/master/xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-index/xwiki-platform-index-ui/src/main/resources/XWiki/DocumentTreeMacros.xml#L137  
18:12 <vmassol> ok  
18:12 <mflorea> $offset 15  
18:15 <vmassol> tmortagne: re my change for the default title of home page (from "Wiki Home" to "Home"), if the user has changed the title, this will generate a conflict right? Any way to say by default: "if the user has changed the title, then use the user's value, otherwise use the new value"?)  
18:17 <tmortagne> vmassol: in case of conflict current value (i.e. user value) has priority in the proposal  
18:17 <vmassol> ok but the user will still see a conflict  
18:17 <tmortagne> sure but it is a conflict  
18:18 <vmassol> yes but if he has set a value, we always want to use his value for this case  
18:18 <vmassol> (and conflict make users worried and jumpy :))  
18:20 <tmortagne> not always no, sometimes he will like better the new standard  
18:21 <vmassol> not in this case  
18:21 <vmassol> :)  
18:22 <vmassol> so does it mean we have no solution ATM?  
18:22 <vmassol> (no pre script or exceptions that can be specified)  
18:25 <mflorea> has quit  
18:34 <tmortagne> vmassol: no there is no way to customize conflict resolution in the extension itself  
18:45 <Enygma`> has quit  
18:45 <evalica> has quit

23:51 <abusenius\_> has quit  
23:55 <elsanchez> has joined #xwiki  
23:55 <elsanchez> is now known as <elsanchez\_>  
23:57 <elsanchez\_> hi there, is anybody there willing to help me pls. It's about some configuration I think  
23:59 <elsanchez\_> I can't see some basic files (template files) if they are formed without the /xwiki/bin/skins/ prefix, for example:               /xwiki/skins/flamingo/logo.png  
23:59 <elsanchez\_> but everything is ok if I use this url \* /xwiki/bin/skins/skins/flamingo/logo.png
